segments.text: Are you sure Lucy has it bad for you ? If she does , she will certainly bend over backwards for you . But if she doesn't , it would be a job to change her .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know whether she has it bad for me , but she enjoys being with me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And do you really love her ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think I do . I don't think I can be happier with another girl .
segments.speaker: S2
